column4: Hi. I have a question. If I forget to turn on my hardware wireless radio switch at boot, my network is not working. Okay. If I then turn the radio switch on, it takes up to 10 minutes before networkmanager is rescanning and connects to my accesspoint. My question is, how can I force networkmanager (or ubuntu) to scan for AP's? I have tried "sudo iwlist wlan0 scanning" but that does only work when am connected(?!?)
